page.title: 08VILLAGE MAGAZINE (CONT.)
page.content:
{Orleton Village Hall At Orleton Village Hall there will be a two night show called 'That's Entertainment'. Performers include scoolchildren from Orleton School, parents, staff and friends.The show takes place on Mon.July 15th and Tues. July 16th starting at 7.30p.m. {St.George's Church Every week in the magazine there is a letter from the vicar Mr. Walters. On Friday nights he gives up his time to run the Youth Club. It starts at 6 o'clock and finishes at 7.30. At 7.00 we are all allowed to ring the church bells. The times of all the services appear in the magazine every month.
There are many{advertisements}in the magazine. They are mainly advertising {local services}like, plumbers, grocers, pubs, builders and lots more.
